These units will be equipped with advanced weaponry, drones, and surveillance systems. The Army is also integrating drone platoons into infantry battalions and bolstering artillery firepower with 'Divyastra' batteries, aiming to transform into a future-ready force.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/army-to-add-more-muscle-on-pakistan-china-fronts/articleshow/122928132.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/army-to-add-more-muscle-on-pakistan-china-fronts/articleshow/122928132.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 03:03:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAJAT PANDIT</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1267892" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928223,imgsize-1267892.cms"/></item><item><title>Michigan horror: 11 stabbed at Walmart in Traverse City; suspect in custody</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/michigan-horror-11-stabbed-at-walmart-in-traverse-city-suspect-in-custody/articleshow/122928854.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/michigan-horror-11-stabbed-at-walmart-in-traverse-city-suspect-in-custody/articleshow/122928854.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 04:36:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1330940" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122929567,imgsize-1330940.cms"/></item><item><title>Government tells Air India to 'end backseat driving' in key departments</title><description><![CDATA[Following safety concerns and a recent incident, the aviation ministry has urged Air India to eliminate "backseat driving" in critical departments. The ministry emphasized that designated post-holders must have the final decision-making authority, ensuring accountability and preventing them from becoming scapegoats. The government is committed to supporting Air India in overcoming its challenges and achieving its potential, drawing on the expertise of Singapore Airlines.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/government-tells-air-india-to-end-backseat-driving-in-key-departments/articleshow/122928239.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/government-tells-air-india-to-end-backseat-driving-in-key-departments/articleshow/122928239.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 03:29:39 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SAURABH SINHA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1280289" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928240,imgsize-1280289.cms"/></item><item><title>Cambodia-Thailand conflict: Heavy shelling continues; both signal openness to talks</title><description><![CDATA[A fierce border conflict between Cambodia and Thailand has escalated, resulting in significant casualties and displacement. International concern has grown, prompting intervention from US President Donald Trump, who urged both nations to agree to a ceasefire. The clashes, fueled by territorial disputes and political tensions, have led to widespread calls for peace and bilateral dialogue to resolve the conflict.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/cambodia-thailand-border-war-enters-fourth-day-heavy-shelling-despite-ceasefire-calls-both-sides-signal-openness-to-talks-after-us-intervention/articleshow/122930625.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/cambodia-thailand-border-war-enters-fourth-day-heavy-shelling-despite-ceasefire-calls-both-sides-signal-openness-to-talks-after-us-intervention/articleshow/122930625.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 07:46:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1361768" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122930695,imgsize-1361768.cms"/></item><item><title>Asia Cup: How India and Pakistan could clash three times in UAE showdown</title><description><![CDATA[The Asia Cup 2025 schedule has been released, with the UAE hosting the T20 tournament from September 9-28. India and Pakistan are in Group A, setting up a highly anticipated clash on September 14. Given their strength, they are expected to qualify for the Super 4s and potentially the final, leading to a possible three encounters between the rivals.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-asia-cup-2025-how-india-and-pakistan-could-clash-three-times-in-uae-showdown/articleshow/122930661.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-asia-cup-2025-how-india-and-pakistan-could-clash-three-times-in-uae-showdown/articleshow/122930661.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 07:49:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="34718" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122930714,imgsize-34718.cms"/></item><item><title>Jeff Bezos sells $1.5 billion worth of Amazon shares, holds stock valued at...</title><description><![CDATA[Jeff Bezos recently sold 6.6 million Amazon shares worth $1.5 billion, as per an SEC filing. The sales occurred on July 21 and 22, before Amazon's Q2 earnings report. These transactions were executed under a prearranged 10b5-1 trading plan. Bezos intends to sell more shares, potentially up to 25 million by May 2026. He has already sold $4.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/jeff-bezos-sells-1-5-billion-worth-of-amazon-shares-now-holds-stock-valued-at/articleshow/122904177.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/jeff-bezos-sells-1-5-billion-worth-of-amazon-shares-now-holds-stock-valued-at/articleshow/122904177.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 25 Jul 2025 16:34:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="22154" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122904169,imgsize-22154.cms"/></item><item><title>American Airlines passengers flee via slides as smoke engulfs plane</title><description><![CDATA[An American Airlines flight bound for Miami aborted takeoff at Denver International Airport due to a landing gear malfunction. Dramatic footage showed passengers evacuating via emergency slides as smoke and flames erupted from the aircraft's rear. The airline identified a tyre issue on the Boeing 737 MAX 8.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/panic-on-denver-runway-american-airlines-aborts-takeoff-over-gear-fault-video-shows-passengers-fleeing-down-slides-as-smoke-engulfs-plane/articleshow/122930256.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/panic-on-denver-runway-american-airlines-aborts-takeoff-over-gear-fault-video-shows-passengers-fleeing-down-slides-as-smoke-engulfs-plane/articleshow/122930256.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 06:48:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3002319" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122930583,imgsize-3002319.cms"/></item><item><title>India signs up for 3-day UN meet for peaceful Palestine; US-France lock horns</title><description><![CDATA[India is set to participate in the UN high-level conference addressing the Palestine question and the two-state solution, co-chaired by France and Saudi Arabia. Despite US warnings against participation, India hopes the conference will pave the way for concrete steps towards a two-state solution, advocating for an immediate ceasefire and hostage release.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-signs-up-for-3-day-un-meet-for-peaceful-palestine/articleshow/122927759.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-signs-up-for-3-day-un-meet-for-peaceful-palestine/articleshow/122927759.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 01:17:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SACHIN PARASHAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1303847" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122927764,imgsize-1303847.cms"/></item><item><title>'Hand was hanging by a thread': Indian-origin man attacked by teen gang in Melbourne</title><description><![CDATA[Saurabh Anand, an Indian-origin man, was brutally attacked by a teen machete gang in Melbourne, resulting in severe injuries. The attack occurred at Central Square Shopping Centre in Altona Meadows, leaving Anand with a severed hand, head injuries, and broken bones. Doctors managed to reattach his hand after extensive surgery, while several teenagers were arrested in connection with the assault.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/my-hand-was-hanging-by-a-thread-indian-origin-man-saurabh-anand-attacked-by-teen-gang-with-a-machete-in-melbourne/articleshow/122927372.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/my-hand-was-hanging-by-a-thread-indian-origin-man-saurabh-anand-attacked-by-teen-gang-with-a-machete-in-melbourne/articleshow/122927372.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 00:40:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31526" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122927377,imgsize-31526.cms"/></item><item><title>Nvidia CEO: Don't feel sad for my employees; I've created more billionaires than...</title><description><![CDATA[Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang boasts of creating numerous billionaires within his management team, attributing it to the success of focused AI research teams. He highlighted the significant impact of smaller, well-funded teams, citing examples like OpenAI and DeepSeek.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-jensen-huang-dont-feel-sad-for-my-employees-ive-created-more-billionaires-on-my-management-team-than-any-ceo-they-are-doing-just-/articleshow/122876810.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-jensen-huang-dont-feel-sad-for-my-employees-ive-created-more-billionaires-on-my-management-team-than-any-ceo-they-are-doing-just-/articleshow/122876810.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 24 Jul 2025 13:39:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43658" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122876805,imgsize-43658.cms"/></item><item><title>First time in 55 years! Gill, Rahul script history for India in Test cricket</title><description><![CDATA[Shubman Gill and KL Rahul etched their names in history, becoming the first Indian pair in 55 years to surpass 500 runs each in an away Test series, emulating Sunil Gavaskar and Dilip Sardesai's 1970-71 feat. Their resilient partnership against England at Old Trafford offered India hope after an early collapse.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-first-time-in-55-years-shubman-gill-kl-rahul-script-history-for-india-in-test-cricket/articleshow/122930593.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-first-time-in-55-years-shubman-gill-kl-rahul-script-history-for-india-in-test-cricket/articleshow/122930593.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 07:18:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="92286" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122930599,imgsize-92286.cms"/></item><item><title>'If you don't play bilateral, don't play tournaments either': Azhar on India vs Pak clash</title><description><![CDATA[Mohammad Azharuddin has weighed in on the India-Pakistan cricket rivalry, questioning the selective nature of their encounters. He suggests that if bilateral series remain off the table, the teams should also abstain from competing in international events.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-if-you-dont-play-bilateral-dont-play-tournaments-either-azharuddin-on-india-vs-pakistan-asia-cup-clash/articleshow/122930105.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-if-you-dont-play-bilateral-dont-play-tournaments-either-azharuddin-on-india-vs-pakistan-asia-cup-clash/articleshow/122930105.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 06:36:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="25902" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122930236,imgsize-25902.cms"/></item><item><title>'Saiyaara' BO collection: Mohit Suri directorial crosses Rs 217 crore mark</title><description><![CDATA[Mohit Suri's romantic drama 'Saiyaara,' starring Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda, has swiftly entered the Rs 200 crore club, amassing Rs 217.25 crore in India within nine days. Surpassing expectations, the film's success, fueled by positive word-of-mouth and an increased screen count, now challenges the Rs 300 crore milestone, potentially becoming one of Bollywood's most profitable ventures.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-9-mohit-suri-directorial-crosses-rs-217-crore-mark-ahaan-panday-and-aneet-padda-starrer-now-eyeing-rs-300-crore-haul/articleshow/122929242.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-9-mohit-suri-directorial-crosses-rs-217-crore-mark-ahaan-panday-and-aneet-padda-starrer-now-eyeing-rs-300-crore-haul/articleshow/122929242.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 05:39:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="150560" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122929465,imgsize-150560.cms"/></item><item><title>Even the dead are filling up Bihar SIR forms, Supreme Court told</title><description><![CDATA[Petitioners have accused the Election Commission of India of conducting Bihar's electoral roll revision in a fraudulent manner. Allegations include BLOs forging signatures, submitting forms for deceased individuals, and voters being enrolled without their knowledge or consent. Concerns are raised about transparency, accountability, and potential disenfranchisement, especially with the demand for citizenship proof for voter enrollment.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/even-the-dead-are-filling-up-bihar-sir-forms-supreme-court-told/articleshow/122928606.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/even-the-dead-are-filling-up-bihar-sir-forms-supreme-court-told/articleshow/122928606.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 04:13:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AMIT ANAND CHOUDHARY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="153620" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928625,imgsize-153620.cms"/></item><item><title>India-UK trade pact to benefit youth, MSMEs, startups: PM Modi</title><description><![CDATA[PM Modi launched infrastructure projects worth over Rs 4,800 crore in southern TN, including a new airport terminal. He highlighted the India-UK FTA's benefits for TN's youth, MSMEs, and traditional industries, emphasizing tax-free access to the UK market for 99% of Indian products. Modi also underscored the NDA government's focus on TN's development through infrastructure, energy, and coastal economy initiatives.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-uk-trade-pact-to-benefit-youth-msmes-startups-pm-modi/articleshow/122928057.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-uk-trade-pact-to-benefit-youth-msmes-startups-pm-modi/articleshow/122928057.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 02:13:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1149509" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928063,imgsize-1149509.cms"/></item><item><title>Supriya claims 14k men got Ladki Bahin scheme benefits, demands CBI probe</title><description><![CDATA[Supriya Sule alleged that approximately 14,000 men improperly benefited from the Mukhyamantri Mazhi Ladki Bahin scheme, demanding a CBI investigation into the enrollment process. Ajit Pawar responded that funds would be recovered from ineligible male beneficiaries, with strict action taken if necessary. Aditi Tatkare stated that benefits for 26.34 lakh ineligible beneficiaries, including men, have been temporarily suspended pending review.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/pune/supriya-claims-14000-men-got-ladki-bahin-scheme-benefits-demands-cbi-probe/articleshow/122927697.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/pune/supriya-claims-14000-men-got-ladki-bahin-scheme-benefits-demands-cbi-probe/articleshow/122927697.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 01:10:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ANURAG BENDE</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="995944" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928457,imgsize-995944.cms"/></item><item><title>Is diabetes one of the first symptoms of pancreatic cancer?</title><description><![CDATA[Sudden diabetes in adults could signal pancreatic cancer. Research indicates a link between new diabetes and this cancer. Studies reveal that about one in four pancreatic cancer patients had diabetes diagnosed recently. For those over 50, sudden diabetes might warrant further investigation. Other symptoms include weight loss and fatigue. Early detection through doctor consultation is crucial for survival. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/is-diabetes-one-of-the-first-symptoms-of-pancreatic-cancer/articleshow/122930097.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/is-diabetes-one-of-the-first-symptoms-of-pancreatic-cancer/articleshow/122930097.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 06:38:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="994385" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122930079,imgsize-994385.cms"/></item><item><title>Taylor & Kelce surprise fans: Missouri baby name reveal goes viral</title><description><![CDATA[In a heartwarming tribute to Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce, a newborn girl has been named Kelce Taylor at Liberty Hospital in Missouri. Born on July 25, 2025, the baby was welcomed as "the youngest Swiftie," adorned in a Kelce jersey. This unique name reflects the couple's significant impact on their fans, blending the worlds of pop music and football.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/taylor-swift-and-travis-kelce-baby-name-reveal-in-missouri-sparks-a-viral-fan-frenzy/articleshow/122927710.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/taylor-swift-and-travis-kelce-baby-name-reveal-in-missouri-sparks-a-viral-fan-frenzy/articleshow/122927710.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 01:09:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="916873" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122927691,imgsize-916873.cms"/></item><item><title>Air India pays interim relief of Rs 25 lakh to 166 crash victims' kin</title><description><![CDATA[Air India has disbursed interim compensation of Rs 25 lakh each to the families of 147 deceased passengers from AI 171 and 19 who died at the accident site. Verification is complete for 52 more families, with payments progressing. The Tata Group's AI-171 Memorial and Welfare Trust pledges Rs 1 crore ex gratia for each deceased and support for B J Medical College Hostel infrastructure.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/air-india-pays-interim-relief-of-rs-25-lakh-to-166-crash-victims-kin/articleshow/122928305.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/air-india-pays-interim-relief-of-rs-25-lakh-to-166-crash-victims-kin/articleshow/122928305.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 03:43:14 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1265533" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928325,imgsize-1265533.cms"/></item><item><title>Drone scare triggers chaos: 1 dead, 8 assaulted in mob attacks</title><description><![CDATA[Widespread panic fueled by drone sighting rumors and suspicious activity has gripped towns in Uttarakhand and Uttar Pradesh, leading to tragic consequences. A 25-year-old laborer died in Udham Singh Nagar after being hit by a car amid the chaos. In Amroha, two separate mob attacks left eight injured, with villagers mistaking victims for thieves.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/meerut/ukhand-man-dies-2-lynching-attempts-in-up-as-drone-scare-triggers-chaos/articleshow/122926232.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/meerut/ukhand-man-dies-2-lynching-attempts-in-up-as-drone-scare-triggers-chaos/articleshow/122926232.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 07:46:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>HARVEER DABAS AND AAKASH AHUJA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1179703" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928366,imgsize-1179703.cms"/></item><item><title>'The day everything changed': Patrick Mahomes reveals mom’s pivotal role</title><description><![CDATA[Patrick Mahomes' extraordinary football journey began in his Texas backyard, not on the field. His mother, Randi Mahomes, playfully tossed footballs in unconventional ways while managing her own tasks. These backyard games unintentionally honed Patrick's adaptability and creativity, shaping the unpredictable playing style that defines him as a Kansas City Chiefs superstar today.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/the-day-everything-changed-patrick-mahomes-opens-up-about-the-surprising-role-his-mom-played-in-his-nfl-journey/articleshow/122925590.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/the-day-everything-changed-patrick-mahomes-opens-up-about-the-surprising-role-his-mom-played-in-his-nfl-journey/articleshow/122925590.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 26 Jul 2025 22:50:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2203692" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122925576,imgsize-2203692.cms"/></item><item><title>Bihar elections 2025: EC to enrol 1st time, new voters in Aug</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission is digitizing records to remove approximately 6.4 million potentially ineligible voters in Bihar, while simultaneously preparing to enroll new electors. A special drive in August will focus on fresh enrollments, requiring applicants to provide proof of Indian citizenship, date and place of birth, and parental details where necessary.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-elections-2025-ec-to-enrol-1st-time-new-voters-in-aug/articleshow/122928567.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-elections-2025-ec-to-enrol-1st-time-new-voters-in-aug/articleshow/122928567.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 04:09:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>BHARTI JAIN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1580386" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928578,imgsize-1580386.cms"/></item><item><title>Ja Morant’s viral China dunk: Sparks debate over NBA Dunk Contest snub</title><description><![CDATA[Ja Morant's dunk in China is creating a buzz. The Memphis Grizzlies star performed a reverse dunk during his Nike tour. The video went viral, sparking calls for him to join the NBA Slam Dunk Contest. Fans believe his participation could revive the event. Morant has hinted at joining if other stars participate.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/ja-morants-viral-dunk-in-china-reignites-debate-over-his-nba-dunk-contest-absence-despite-fan-pressure/articleshow/122926549.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/ja-morants-viral-dunk-in-china-reignites-debate-over-his-nba-dunk-contest-absence-despite-fan-pressure/articleshow/122926549.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 26 Jul 2025 23:44:01 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="47372" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122926545,imgsize-47372.cms"/></item><item><title>Schoolgoers to learn about Operation Sindoor in new NCERT module</title><description><![CDATA[NCERT is developing an educational module on ‘Operation Sindoor’ to educate schoolchildren about India's military capabilities and technological advancements. The module, designed for Classes 3 to 12, will highlight India's defence readiness, scientific progress, and growing global stature. It will also cover themes like Mission LiFE, the Partition's horrors, and India's space achievements, including Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla's ISS visit.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/students-to-learn-about-operation-sindoors-military-triumph-in-new-ncert-module/articleshow/122924293.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/students-to-learn-about-operation-sindoors-military-triumph-in-new-ncert-module/articleshow/122924293.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 26 Jul 2025 20:13:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1734915" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122924349,imgsize-1734915.cms"/></item><item><title>11/7 case: It started in a jail cell. Now, it fights to free those wrongfully jailed</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/2006-mumbai-train-blasts-it-started-in-a-jail-cell-now-it-fights-to-free-those-wrongfully-jailed/articleshow/122930276.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/2006-mumbai-train-blasts-it-started-in-a-jail-cell-now-it-fights-to-free-those-wrongfully-jailed/articleshow/122930276.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 06:40:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1325866" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122930271,imgsize-1325866.cms"/></item><item><title>Odisha girl ‘set ablaze’ retracts earlier statement</title><description><![CDATA[A 15-year-old girl from Puri has withdrawn her claim of being set ablaze by three men. She stated the initial report was due to trauma. Police are investigating a possible self-immolation attempt. Authorities found no evidence to support her original statement. Four people testified in court regarding the case.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bhubaneswar/puri-girl-set-ablaze-retracts-earlier-statement/articleshow/122926598.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bhubaneswar/puri-girl-set-ablaze-retracts-earlier-statement/articleshow/122926598.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 26 Jul 2025 23:46:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>HEMANTA PRADHAN AND DEBABRATA MOHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1048938" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928026,imgsize-1048938.cms"/></item><item><title>2nd conversion case in U’khand: Six named; ‘link with Muslim Brotherhood’ suspected</title><description><![CDATA[Dehradun Police filed a second case involving six individuals for allegedly converting a 28-year-old woman and attempting to send her to the UAE with forged documents for marriage. SSP Ajai Singh revealed links to the banned Muslim Brotherhood. The woman, Sumaiyya, was influenced through online interactions, including a Pakistani cleric and a Dubai-based contact.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/2nd-case-of-religious-conversion-filed-in-dehradun6-named-link-with-muslim-brotherhood-suspected/articleshow/122925222.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/2nd-case-of-religious-conversion-filed-in-dehradun6-named-link-with-muslim-brotherhood-suspected/articleshow/122925222.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 26 Jul 2025 22:01:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>KALYAN DAS</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1239073" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928073,imgsize-1239073.cms"/></item><item><title>Sad to support a government that has failed to control crime: Chirag Paswan</title><description><![CDATA[LJP (Ram Vilas) chief Chirag Paswan has strongly criticized the Nitish Kumar-led Bihar government over the state's deteriorating law and order situation. Paswan expressed concern about rising crime rates, including incidents of murder, rape, and robbery, questioning the administration's ability to maintain control. While acknowledging Kumar's past achievements, Paswan insisted that silence is not an option.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/sad-to-support-a-govt-that-has-failed-to-control-crime-chirag/articleshow/122922276.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/sad-to-support-a-govt-that-has-failed-to-control-crime-chirag/articleshow/122922276.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 26 Jul 2025 17:13:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>JAINARAIN PANDEY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="25230" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928947,imgsize-25230.cms"/></item><item><title>Shah: India's rising stature to invite new security challenges</title><description><![CDATA[Amit Shah highlighted the Modi government's commitment to zero-tolerance against terrorism through Operation Sindoor at the National Security Strategies Conference. He urged security agencies to enhance real-time data sharing and coordination to address emerging security challenges as India's economy grows. Shah emphasized a 'security-first' approach and the use of national databases for effective strategy implementation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/shah-indias-rising-stature-to-invite-new-security-challenges/articleshow/122929414.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/shah-indias-rising-stature-to-invite-new-security-challenges/articleshow/122929414.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 05:24:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="905157" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122929455,imgsize-905157.cms"/></item><item><title>7 Maoists shot dead: 3 in Jharkhand, 4 in Chhattisgarh</title><description><![CDATA[In separate encounters on Saturday, security forces neutralized Maoist threats in Jharkhand and Chhattisgarh. Three members of the banned JJMP splinter group were killed in Gumla, Jharkhand, following a planned security operation. Simultaneously, in Chhattisgarh's Bijapur district, at least four Maoists were killed during an ongoing encounter, with weapons and explosives recovered from the site.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/7-maoists-shot-dead-3-in-jharkhand-4-in-chhattisgarh/articleshow/122928230.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/7-maoists-shot-dead-3-in-jharkhand-4-in-chhattisgarh/articleshow/122928230.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 03:21:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>K A GUPTA AND RASHMI DROLIA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="393991" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928232,imgsize-393991.cms"/></item><item><title>Goyal: No compromises, only benefits in trade deal with UK</title><description><![CDATA[Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal announced that India secured significant advantages in the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) with the UK, safeguarding sensitive sectors like rice, sugar, and dairy. The agreement lowers duties on automobiles and scotch while protecting domestic industries and intellectual property rights. CETA also ensures India receives recognition for Geographical Indication (GI) products like Kolhapuri chappals.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/goyal-no-compromises-only-benefits-in-trade-deal-with-uk/articleshow/122929374.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/goyal-no-compromises-only-benefits-in-trade-deal-with-uk/articleshow/122929374.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 05:21:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1028781" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122929398,imgsize-1028781.cms"/></item><item><title>Bihar woman faints at home guard test, raped in ambulance</title><description><![CDATA[In Bodh Gaya, Bihar, a home guard aspirant was allegedly gang-raped by an ambulance driver and a health department technician after collapsing during a fitness test. The incident occurred while she was being transported to a hospital, prompting a police investigation and the arrest of both accused.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-woman-faints-at-home-guard-test-raped-in-ambulance/articleshow/122929062.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-woman-faints-at-home-guard-test-raped-in-ambulance/articleshow/122929062.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 04:51:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ABDUL QADIR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1099619" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122929113,imgsize-1099619.cms"/></item><item><title>1 pyre, 2 siblings: Fury over Rajasthan school tragedy</title><description><![CDATA[A pall of grief descended upon Piplodi village in Rajasthan as families mourned the loss of seven schoolchildren, aged 7 to 13, killed in a school building collapse. The tragedy, which occurred during school hours, left 21 others injured. Authorities are investigating the incident, with an FIR filed against school officials.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/1-pyre-2-siblings-fury-over-rajasthan-school-tragedy/articleshow/122928658.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/1-pyre-2-siblings-fury-over-rajasthan-school-tragedy/articleshow/122928658.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 04:18:20 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SHOEB KHAN AND RAJIV SAXENA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1008666" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928688,imgsize-1008666.cms"/></item><item><title>Private hospitals, nursing homes treat patients like ATMs, says HC</title><description><![CDATA[The Allahabad High Court dismissed a medical negligence case petition, highlighting concerns about private hospitals exploiting patients for financial gain. The case involved a doctor accused of negligence leading to a foetal death and demanding extra money. The court emphasized that protection applies only to diligent medical professionals, not those running poorly equipped facilities solely for profit, stressing the importance of ordinary care in treatment.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/pvt-hosps-treat-patients-like-atms-hc/articleshow/122927499.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/pvt-hosps-treat-patients-like-atms-hc/articleshow/122927499.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 00:46:46 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="49490" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122929629,imgsize-49490.cms"/></item><item><title>Maintaining sustained eco growth govt’s top priority: FM Sitharaman</title><description><![CDATA[Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman emphasized that sustaining economic growth is the government's top priority, alongside supporting the economy. She highlighted the importance of public investment as a key driver and noted the need for increased private sector investment. While cautioning against easing restrictions on investments from bordering countries post-Covid, she acknowledged some relaxations in specific sectors like renewable energy.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/maintaining-sustained-eco-growth-govts-top-priority-fm-nirmala-sitharaman/articleshow/122929506.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/maintaining-sustained-eco-growth-govts-top-priority-fm-nirmala-sitharaman/articleshow/122929506.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 05:33:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1048865" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122929533,imgsize-1048865.cms"/></item><item><title>What's in a name? 22 days in jail & a 17-year legal battle</title><description><![CDATA[Rajveer Singh Yadav was wrongly arrested due to a clerical error that swapped his name with his brother's, leading to a 17-year legal battle. Despite police admitting the mistake early on, the case dragged through the courts, devastating Rajveer's life and his family's well-being. A Mainpuri court has finally acquitted him, ordering action against the negligent officers responsible for his suffering and lost opportunities.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/whats-in-a-name-22-days-in-jail-a-17-year-legal-battle/articleshow/122929705.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/whats-in-a-name-22-days-in-jail-a-17-year-legal-battle/articleshow/122929705.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 05:51:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SUDEEP LAVANIA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1408935" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122929726,imgsize-1408935.cms"/></item><item><title>22-vehicle pile-up on Mumbai-Pune e-way kills 1</title><description><![CDATA[A tragic accident on the Pune-Mumbai Expressway resulted in the death of a 58-year-old woman and injuries to 18 others after a trailer truck's brakes failed, causing it to ram into 22 vehicles. The incident led to significant traffic delays, with emergency services responding to assist the injured, who were transported to nearby hospitals for treatment.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/22-vehicle-pile-up-on-mumbai-pune-e-way-kills-1/articleshow/122929137.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/22-vehicle-pile-up-on-mumbai-pune-e-way-kills-1/articleshow/122929137.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 04:59:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="654463" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122929184,imgsize-654463.cms"/></item><item><title>J&K cops seize heroin dropped from Pakistan drone in Samba</title><description><![CDATA[In Jammu & Kashmir's Samba district, police seized approximately 500 grams of heroin in Chillyari village, suspected to have been dropped by a Pakistani drone. Authorities have registered an FIR under the NDPS Act and Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act. This incident follows a similar attempt on December 15, where BSF troops intercepted a drone carrying narcotics in the Arnia sector.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/jk-cops-seize-heroin-dropped-from-pakistan-drone-in-samba/articleshow/122926637.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/jk-cops-seize-heroin-dropped-from-pakistan-drone-in-samba/articleshow/122926637.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 26 Jul 2025 23:53:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SANJAY KHAJURIA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1193299" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122926724,imgsize-1193299.cms"/></item><item><title>HC orders fresh look at hijack convict's early release plea</title><description><![CDATA[The Delhi High Court has offered a reprieve to Hari Singh, who is serving a life sentence for hijacking an Indian Airlines flight in 1993. Justice Sanjeev Narula overturned the Sentence Review Board's (SRB) denial of his premature release, citing his reformed conduct in jail over 18 years, devoid of any criminal incidents.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/hc-orders-fresh-look-at-hijack-convicts-early-release-plea/articleshow/122929247.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/hc-orders-fresh-look-at-hijack-convicts-early-release-plea/articleshow/122929247.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 05:09:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32976" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122929319,imgsize-32976.cms"/></item><item><title>Twin probes into police ‘firing’ death of Jammu youth</title><description><![CDATA[Following the alleged fatal police shooting of 21-year-old Mohammad Parvez in Jammu, both magisterial and police investigations have been initiated amid widespread protests and condemnation. The probes aim to uncover the truth behind the incident, with Parvez's family and community leaders alleging a fake encounter, while police claim crossfire during a drug peddler chase led to his death. Senior officials and politicians have called for a transparent and impartial inquiry.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/twin-probes-into-police-firing-death-of-jammu-youth/articleshow/122926901.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/twin-probes-into-police-firing-death-of-jammu-youth/articleshow/122926901.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 00:10:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SANJAY KHAJURIA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="488283" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122927004,imgsize-488283.cms"/></item><item><title>On Kargil Diwas, Nalsa offers free legal aid to those in uniform</title><description><![CDATA[To honor soldiers on Kargil Vijay Diwas, Justice Surya Kant launched 'Veer Parivar Sahayata Yojana,' offering free legal aid to soldiers, paramilitary personnel, and their families. This initiative aims to expedite justice in their civil and criminal cases. The scheme extends to CISF, BSF, and NDRF personnel, acknowledging their selfless service in safeguarding the nation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/on-kargil-diwas-nalsa-offers-free-legal-aid-to-those-in-uniform/articleshow/122929663.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/on-kargil-diwas-nalsa-offers-free-legal-aid-to-those-in-uniform/articleshow/122929663.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 05:47:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1888566" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122929673,imgsize-1888566.cms"/></item><item><title>Maha bizman gets 1-year jail for kissing bank employee</title><description><![CDATA[A Mumbai businessman, Narendra Sagvekar, has been sentenced to one year of rigorous imprisonment for outraging the modesty of a female bank employee. The incident occurred during an address verification visit to Sagvekar's residence. The magistrate's court found the woman's testimony credible, despite defense arguments of a false complaint.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/mumbai-bizman-gets-1-year-ri-for-outraging-modesty-of-bank-employee-during-address-verification-visit/articleshow/122923978.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/mumbai-bizman-gets-1-year-ri-for-outraging-modesty-of-bank-employee-during-address-verification-visit/articleshow/122923978.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 26 Jul 2025 19:40:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>REBECCA SAMERVEL</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1467478" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928079,imgsize-1467478.cms"/></item><item><title>Punjab government rolls out fresh strategy to combat stubble burning</title><description><![CDATA[Ahead of harvest season, Punjab is implementing a data-driven strategy to combat stubble burning. Villages are categorized by fire incident history to enable targeted interventions. Strict penalties, ranging from ₹5,000 to ₹30,000, will be enforced for violations, with repeat offenders facing legal action. Real-time monitoring and inter-departmental coordination are key to the "zero tolerance" approach.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chandigarh/punjab-govt-rolls-out-fresh-strategy-to-combat-stubble-burning/articleshow/122923842.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chandigarh/punjab-govt-rolls-out-fresh-strategy-to-combat-stubble-burning/articleshow/122923842.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 26 Jul 2025 19:25:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>BHARAT KHANNA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31488" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122923840,imgsize-31488.cms"/></item><item><title>3 sisters, daughters of daily wager, clear UGC NET together</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chandigarh/three-sisters-from-poor-family-clear-ugc-net-in-1st-attempt/articleshow/122923412.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chandigarh/three-sisters-from-poor-family-clear-ugc-net-in-1st-attempt/articleshow/122923412.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 26 Jul 2025 18:43:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NEEL KAMAL</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23276" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122923411,imgsize-23276.cms"/></item><item><title>Court grants bail to co-accused in case involving Vikas Yadav</title><description><![CDATA[A Delhi court granted bail to Jalaluddin, a co-accused in an extortion and kidnapping case involving Vikas Yadav, who is also implicated in the Pannun assassination plot. The complainant, Raj Kumar Walia, alleged abduction and robbery by Yadav and another individual. However, the court noted Walia's trip to Thailand with Jalaluddin shortly after filing the FIR, raising doubts about the claims.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/court-grants-bail-to-co-accused-in-case-involving-vikas-yadav/articleshow/122928522.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/court-grants-bail-to-co-accused-in-case-involving-vikas-yadav/articleshow/122928522.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 04:05:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="38472" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928539,imgsize-38472.cms"/></item><item><title>Girl's parents tie boy to tree, beat him to death in MP village</title><description><![CDATA[In a shocking incident in Madhya Pradesh's Ratlam district, a 17-year-old boy was brutally murdered by the girl's family after being caught meeting her at a temple. The boy was tied to a tree, tonsured, and fatally beaten. Police have arrested four individuals, including the girl's father, and booked them for murder.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/girls-parents-tie-boy-to-tree-beat-him-to-death-in-mp-village/articleshow/122928032.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/girls-parents-tie-boy-to-tree-beat-him-to-death-in-mp-village/articleshow/122928032.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 01:57:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1503255" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928034,imgsize-1503255.cms"/></item><item><title>Two Andhra intel officers killed in Telangana accident</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/hyderabad/2-ap-intel-officers-killed-in-choutuppal-road-accident/articleshow/122927123.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/hyderabad/2-ap-intel-officers-killed-in-choutuppal-road-accident/articleshow/122927123.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 00:19:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>MAHESH BUDDI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="88182" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122928067,imgsize-88182.cms"/></item></channel></rss>
